website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking pair of shoes for walking or work that are particularly noted for their airy insoles.
pros: The memory foam-gel insoles in these shoes have many claiming that they are like “walking on air.” For work or walking, these sleek shoes stand out for their great support and comfort
cons: The soles of these shoes are a common source of complaints, with many feeling that the curved nature of the soles make the shoes seem unstable

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Men's Ultra V DMX Max Walking Shoe (whew, that's a mouthful)
customer_reviews.text: Best Walking Shoe Ever. Tried a LOT in my 40 plus years of Sport Walking, and it's been nothing but Reebok DMX for the last 20+ years. Great Shoe, but Very Hard to Find in Retail and sometimes online. Also. Reebok uses Way Too Many descriptors to describe their shoes. You have to watch like a Hawk that You get the one You intended to get. All DMX's are not equal. I only use the ones with Air Chambers in the Soles.
customer_reviews.author: OLDEESTUNES

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the same Reebok classic black leather mid-top style shoes for over 23 years then Reebok decided to discontinue the shoes. I have been calling Reebok, looking online and going to shoe stores for about 3 months trying to find a replacement. Thought these would be the closest match to the shoes I liked. I happy to report they are very comfortable and I love the memory foam/gel soles. They would be perfect if they also had a mid-top option as I like the support for my ankles. I purchased some Skechers shoes that are good 3 days before I found these shoes but I like the Reeboks better.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Reeboks are the only shoes I have ever found that ...
customer_reviews.text: Reeboks are the only shoes I have ever found that will fit me perfectly right off the shelf! I can buy a size 10.5 from anywhere and, when I get it home, it fits me perfectly. No BS, just fact!
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW

customer_reviews.title: Harvey flood water casualty
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear these out before replacing them. But, I had to replace these after spending several days walking in Harvey's flood waters. Everything is great about these shoes. I would recommend these to anyone wanting a good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ted Buehring

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for someone who's on his feet all day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He can only wear Reebok shoes comfortably. He will wear nothing else as everything else hurt his feet. He is on his feet all day and needs comfortable shoes. He wears these out in about 3 months, but as long as they work for him, that's what I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: desrtroz

customer_reviews.title: I no longer look for substitutes, it has to be Ultra DMX
customer_reviews.text: Every year as the current pair wears out, I worry that I wont be able to find it and they may not have a replacement line yet, or that it won't be as good. So far though, they haven't killed off their Ultra DMX line. Sometimes it can be hard to find, but I always keep searching. I learned long ago, nothing else will do for my feet . Tthis gets 5 stars from me until I find it's better anywhere near the price. I have paid 2-3 times the price and not gotten the comfort or support.
customer_reviews.author: A. Neilll

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good quality, good fit, good comfort, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Athletic shoes are kind of like cars, some brands you like some you don't. I happen to be a big fan of Reebok for their foot support and have been wearing this style for years and love them for both comfort and their looks.
customer_reviews.author: mkpi

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I been wearing Nike air for the longest time and these just blew them away. I walk over 400,000 steps a month. I am sure these will hold up
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: At least try them
customer_reviews.text: Simply the most comfortable and supportive shoes I have ever. I have worn them for at least 10 years. Like walking on a cloud. I am a moderate pronator I take out the inserts and put in Sof Sole for wonderful support 24.00 $. The air cushion is great. I wish they would make a HIKING BOOT with similar characteristics. The shoes last a very long time. I hope they never stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: this is the best so far Im a nurse
customer_reviews.text: Wow DMX the go to for comfort.this is the best so far Im a nurse.buy it
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Strange I bought 2 one black one white. Black lasted perfect 3 yrs so far. White immediately cracked and got real messed up after very little wear. Black is still nice when I work in every day. So I tried to order another white but it was too big.
customer_reviews.author: d h

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. Very comfortable (even without breaking in) with great arch support (my back notices the difference). I have bought several pairs in this style previously (some of which have had a second life as field shoes) and these seem to be just as well made.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Peters

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is designed to give your arch and bottom of your foot the support needed for long walks.
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike I have regarding Reeboks walking shoes are the excessively long shoe strings. I was told by a Reebok rep that his is addresses the different heights that a customers arch can present.
customer_reviews.author: Vinces2

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Wear for work, got two pair and when they needed replacing i ordered the same again! Plenty of toe room and heel does not rub. A great fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Came in the mail today and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these model shoe for years and paying a lot more for them. Came in the mail today and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Walkers!
customer_reviews.text: Reebok makes great walking shoes and this an example. I have for a number of years worn these for my daily walks and gym time. If you know what size you wear they will be a proper fit right out of the box. Buy them, you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Reval

customer_reviews.title: I like to get out and explore on foot
customer_reviews.text: Can't argue with Reebok walking shoes. When I go traveling, I like to get out and explore on foot. Tours, taxis and Uber all fine for the convenience, but I like being able to stop and look interesting things over. For those times when I go walkabout, these shoes are super-easy on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: jeffprime

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for urban exploring
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair over a span of decades. Love em'. Great travel shoe for urban exploration or trail hiking. Very comfortable, and good arch support. 10, 15 miles in a day, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: steve9631

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes! They can be hard to find at times but are worth the search. I am on my feet all day at work and the air pockets in the heel and ball of the foot add extra cushion when you step down.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Cushion feature is completely true!
customer_reviews.text: These walking shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned! After reading all the great reviews I decided to buy 2 pairs and I'm really glad I did. The cushion feature they talk about is completely true! I love the feel of these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiiboy58

customer_reviews.title: They felt as comfortable as my older pair of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this very shoe for several years because they provide support and comfort for my feet. I have neuropathy in my feet. This pair that I just purchased is identical to a pair I have been wearing. I have only tried them on, and not walked in them. They felt as comfortable as my older pair of these shoes. I also thought that the price was very competitive to past prices at the Reebok store.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Was able to wear them the first time for eight hours without any discomfort, so didn't require any breaking in. I have a big foot and have to wear a men's shoes because they never have my size in women's. I have always been a big fan of Reeboks DMX shoes and these shoes proved it's reputation again.
customer_reviews.author: shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Have worn the Reebok Ultra V DMX Max track shoes for years. They always fit and need no breaking in. Sorry to hear that Reebok may not be making these any more. Disappointed that we cannot find them locally and had to order on=line.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day and these shoes are the ONLY shoes I have found that don't make my feet hurt. I also have back problems and since I started wearing these, my back has stopped hurting as much. I strongly recommend these shoes for anyone who is on their feet constantly throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: DWilli

customer_reviews.title: Beware the rounded soles
customer_reviews.text: Should have heeded other reviewers' warnings about the soles of these shoes. They are rounded instead of flat. This compromises my balance. They have found a home in the very back of my farthest closet, replaced by a pair of Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had to be sent back that were size 9 like my other ones that i have been wearing and ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew I had to order them a half size larger than all my other DMX to be big enough as the last ones I ordered had to be sent back that were size 9 like my other ones that i have been wearing and they were at least a half inch shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reebok DMX shoes are the best for your feet for walking or standing for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Reebok's DMX they shoe is tops very comfortable snug fit it helps you when you're walking or even standing on your feet a lot the air in Seoul is awesome even the cushioning inside the shoe will helps your feet it is a shame that Reebok is about to discontinue their shoe I wish they could continue it

customer_reviews.title: Great arrival time
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. They fit perfectly right out of the box and he loves them, even if they're still painfully white. Great arrival time, too.

customer_reviews.title: wore out my old pair and found these online

I Only got black for when I where black and for work, I where the brown ones with everything else. these are Still the most comfortable walking shoes I have owned and the large heel makes you feel taller. lol

customer_reviews.text: Bought my last pair of Reeboks 15 years ago, and they're still wearable. This pair replaces a pair I bought maybe 20 years ago, still intact but the linings were finally disintegrating. This latest pair is very comfortable with super support.

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They fit great, good support and very comfy. They are very hard to find anymore,I guess Reebok has stopped making them so when I see them I try to grab a pair.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes once trying them on. There is a slight ridge down the center of the sole which cause my feet to "rock" left and right while walking. I just doesn't work for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband walks 4-5 miles every morning and this is the only shoe he's found that wears well and is super comfortable. So glad we found them here. Our local Reebok outlet has closed, and he was devastated to think he wouldn't be able to find them again! He LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Cinjoybeach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in these shoes has no match
customer_reviews.text: They are the most comfortable tennis shoe I've ever worn. The air bladder really softens the pounding on the feet. I would highly recommend these to people with sensitive feet. Thanks again Peter S.

If I were Reebok I wouldn't be surprised if the average rating continues to slip.

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Walk Ultra V DMX Max Shoe
product_meta.description:
Stay comfortable and cool with this Reebok attack training shoe. Reebok DMX ride technology adds superior comfort. The outsole comes with targeted rubber construction for traction and flexibility. The low-cut construction lets ankles move freely.

Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
